name: Another Story: Prologue
description:
A Visual Novel prototype built with free assets and Stable Diffusion on Godot. 

Go through the prologue and try to understand what happened.

This project was made in order to gain experience in the development of visual novels, use of neural networks, use of localizations and development for Android.

Maybe someday I'll make a full story.

P.S. Most of the translation was done using google translate, some inaccuracies are possible :)
